content: प्रभावः {@--1@} Lustre, splendour, brilliance. {@--2@} Dignity, glory, majesty grandeur, majestic lustre; प्रभाववानिव लक्ष्यते <ls>Ś. 1.</ls> {@--3@} Strength, valour, power, efficacy; <ls>Pt. 1. 7.</ls> {@--4@} Regal power (one of the three Śaktis <ab>q. v.</ab>). {@--5@} A superhuman power or faculty, miraculous power; <ls>R. 2. 41</ls>, <ls n="R. 2.">62</ls>; <ls n="R.">3. 40</ls>, <ls>V. 1</ls>, <ls n="V.">2</ls>, <ls n="V.">5.</ls> {@--6@} Magnanimity. {@--7@} Extension, circumference.
